snippet: Mr. Obama was grilled about the botched rollout of the health care law and the attack on the American post in Benghazi, Libya, among other issues.
abstract: Pres Obama faces full-scale blitz by Bill O'Reilly of Fox News in an interview before the Super Bowl; Obama sat for the interview in keeping with his tradition of appearing on the network broadcast of game.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Obama was grilled about the botched rollout of the health care law and the attack on the American post in Benghazi, Libya, among other issues.

headline.main: Obama Is Tackled by O’Reilly in Pre-Game Interview
headline.print_headline: Obama Is Tackled by O’Reilly Before Game

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
